metadata.title: CVE-2017-6300 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.1. This is related to a patchdescribed as "3 of 9. Buffer Overflow in version field inlib/tnef-types.h."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6300` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.9.1-1
ytnef-tools - 1.9.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.1-1').
